item.title:
Mental math bar trick üçª How to easily multiply any two-digit number by 11
e.g. 27√ó11 = 297 Add the two digits, 2+7 = 9, and place the resulting sum between them ‚Üí 2ùüó7
If the sum of the digits is >= 10 you have to carry 1, and add it to the first digit. https://t.co/xMb62ACjKv

üîé Rather than refine existing algorithms, AlphaDev started from scratch in a computer‚Äôs assembly instructions.
